name: track-1
description: 1. Build the event-hubs package `rush build -t event-hubs`. 2. Navigate to `event-hubs` folder `cd sdk\eventhub\event-hubs\`. 3. Create an event-hubs namespace and populate the .env file at `eventhub\event-hubs` folder with `EVENTHUB_CONNECTION_STRING` and `EVENTHUB_NAME` variables. 4. Run the tests as follows.    - batch send      - `npm run perf-test:node -- SendTest --warmup 2 --duration 7 --parallel 2`
